text: Edward C. Oliver (born May 31, 1930) is an American politician in the state of Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota State Senate from 1993 to 2002. He is a lawyer.https://www.leg.state.mn.us/legdb/fulldetail?ID=13379 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Minnesota Republicans Category:Minnesota state senators
title: Edward C. Oliver
